control.name: icbSizeMode
control.description: This combo box allows you to select how the image is displayed within the image editor.

control.name: ceIcon
control.description: This check box shows or hides an identification icon which is displayed within the editor's edit region.

control.name: ceMenu
control.description: This check box controls whether the context menu is displayed when an end user right clicks the editor's dropdown window.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: This check box controls whether end-users can resize the dropdown window by dragging its bottom right corner.

control.name: ceCustomIcons
control.description: This check box controls whether the default or custom images are used to indicate whether the editor contains data.

hint.name: imageEditSample
hint.hinttext: #KeyboardALT+DOWN, F4 to show or hide the dropdown image editor
